sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIDDEE, or Sedee : an Arabic title, by which the Abyssinians or Habaſhys are always diſtinguiſhed in the courts of Hindoſtan ; where, being in great repute for firmneſs and fidelity, they are generally employed as commanders of forts or in poſts of great truſt.
